original_text: Then the people will travel through the land, and they will be sad and hungry. Because of their hunger they will become angry. They will curse their king and their God, as they look up to the sky.
korean_text: 이 땅으로 헤매며 곤고하며 굶주릴 것이라 그가 굶주릴 때에 격분하여 자기의 왕과 자기의 하나님을 저주할 것이며 위를 쳐다보거나

sentences.original_text: Then the people will travel through the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 백성들이 그 땅을 여행하게 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: and they will be sad and hungry
Because of their hunger they will become angry
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 굶주림 때문에 그들은 화가 나게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will curse their king and their God
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신들의 왕과 하나님을 저주할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: as they look up to the sky
